alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Gibson; Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:19PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Crockett, southwestern Gibson, northeastern Haywood and central Madison Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 319 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alamo, or 13 miles west of Humboldt, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Humboldt, Fairview, Alamo, Bells, Three Way, Adair, Carroll, Maury City, Gadsden, Neely, Quincy, Huntersville, Westover, Jones, Gilmore, Mason Grove, Coxville, Fruitvale and Youngs Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for west Tennessee.
